categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Freedom Strike Seltos was the codename for a New Republic operation on the planet Seltos during the early years of the government's formation. A group of operatives were sent to the planet to investigate whether or not the Seltos Magister of Trade, Sinya Deboora, was an Imperial spy. During the operation, the operatives discovered a secret Imperial base to the west of Sommin City, discouraged an Imperial strike on the planet, and rescued six New Republic diplomats from pro-Imperial terrorists.
